author: Times Of India
title: Punjab: Ludhiana ACP succumbs to coronavirus
description: After battling for his life for 10 days in hospital, Ludhiana assistant commissioner of police - north, Anil Kohli succumbed to coronavirus on Saturday afternoon. He had tested positive for the virus on April 13, however, he was admitted in SPS Hospital since…
